DOC.detailed_description: The medical record 94 patient undergone vitreous surgery proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( PDR ) follow least 6 month review . The subject divide three group ; never-treated group consist patient previous ophthalmic examination first visit vitreous surgery prescribe ; non-compliant group consist patient history miss ophthalmic examination one year period , compliant group consist patient ophthalmic examination least year . The evaluation include age , gender , plasma level glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) preoperative examination , presence preoperative panretinal photocoagulation , preoperative best-corrected visual acuity ( BCVA ) , postoperative BCVA final examination , status PDR , number vitreous surgery , presence pre- postoperative neovascular glaucoma .
